entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
